trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowDeleting"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Gir dataene for den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowDeleting"> </xref> hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowDeleting> event when a Delete button is clicked, but before the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control deletes the record.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>kontrollere hever den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowDeleting>hendelse når en Slett-knapp, men før den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>kontrollen sletter.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowDeleting> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: (A Delete button is a button control whose `CommandName` property is set to "Delete".) You can perform a custom routine whenever this event occurs, such as canceling the delete operation.
trans-unit.target: (En Delete-knappen er en knapp kontrollere der `CommandName` er satt til "Delete".) Når denne hendelsen oppstår, for eksempel avbryter sletteoperasjonen, kan du utføre en egendefinert rutine.

trans-unit.source: A GridViewDeleteEventArgs object is passed to the event handler.
trans-unit.target: En GridViewDeleteEventArgs-objekt er sendt til hendelsesbehandlingen.

trans-unit.source: This enables you to determine the index of the row being deleted and to cancel the delete operation.
trans-unit.target: Dette gjør mulig å finne ut indeksen i raden slettes og avbryte sletteoperasjonen.

trans-unit.source: To cancel the delete operation, set the <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A> property of the GridViewDeleteEventArgs object to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil avbryte sletteoperasjonen, angitt i <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>for GridViewDeleteEventArgs-objektet til `true`.</xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can also manipulate the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewDeleteEventArgs.Keys%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewDeleteEventArgs.Values%2A> collections before the values are passed to the data source.
trans-unit.target: Du kan også redigere den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewDeleteEventArgs.Keys%2A>og <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewDeleteEventArgs.Values%2A>samlinger før verdiene er sendt til datakilden.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewDeleteEventArgs.Values%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewDeleteEventArgs.Keys%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about how to handle events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om hvordan du håndtere [NIB: bruker hendelser](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: For a list of initial property values for an instance of GridViewDeleteEventArgs, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewDeleteEventArgs.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: En liste med opprinnelige verdier for en forekomst av GridViewDeleteEventArgs, kan du se den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewDeleteEventArgs.%23ctor%2A>konstruktør.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewDeleteEventArgs.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewDeleteEventArgs"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewDeleteEventArgs"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property value for an instance of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewDeleteEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: Tabellen nedenfor viser første egenskapsverdien for en forekomst av <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewDeleteEventArgs>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewDeleteEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: |Property|Initial value| |--------------|-------------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewDeleteEventArgs.RowIndex%2A>|The value of the `rowIndex` parameter.| > [!NOTE] > This constructor is primarily used by control developers when they raise events.
trans-unit.target: | Egenskapen | Standardverdi | |--------------|-------------------| | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewDeleteEventArgs.RowIndex%2A>| Verdien for den `rowIndex` parameteren. | > [!NOTE] > Denne konstruktøren brukes hovedsakelig av kontrollutviklere når de heve hendelser.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewDeleteEventArgs.RowIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: The index of the row that contains the Delete button that raised the event.
trans-unit.target: Indeksen i raden som inneholder Delete-knappen som hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: Gets a dictionary of field name/value pairs that represent the primary key of the row to delete.
trans-unit.target: Henter en ordliste for feltet Navn/verdi-par som representerer primærnøkkelen for raden som skal slettes.

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.DataKeyNames%2A> property of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control is set, use the Keys property (dictionary) to get the value of the primary key or keys of the row to delete.
trans-unit.target: Når den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.DataKeyNames%2A>for en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>kontrollen er angitt, bruke egenskapen nøkler (ordliste) til å hente verdien for primærnøkkel eller nøklene i raden som skal slettes.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.DataKeyNames%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > To get the values of the non-key fields, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewDeleteEventArgs.Values%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > For verdiene i feltene ikke er en nøkkel, bruker du <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewDeleteEventArgs.Values%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewDeleteEventArgs.Values%2A>

trans-unit.source: The Keys dictionary is automatically populated with the name/value pairs of the field or fields specified in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.DataKeyNames%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Nøkler ordlisten automatisk fylles ut med navn/verdi-par med feltet eller feltene som er angitt i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.DataKeyNames%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.DataKeyNames%2A>

trans-unit.source: If multiple fields form the primary key, a separate entry is added to the Keys dictionary for each key field.
trans-unit.target: Hvis flere felt utgjør primærnøkkel, legges en egen oppføring nøkler stavemåten for hvert felt.

trans-unit.source: To determine the name of a key field, use the <xref:System.Collections.DictionaryEntry.Key%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property of a <xref:System.Collections.DictionaryEntry?displayProperty=fullName> object in the Keys dictionary.
trans-unit.target: Bruk til å fastslå navnet på et felt i <xref:System.Collections.DictionaryEntry.Key%2A?displayProperty=fullName>for en <xref:System.Collections.DictionaryEntry?displayProperty=fullName>objektet i ordlisten nøkler.</xref:System.Collections.DictionaryEntry?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Collections.DictionaryEntry.Key%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: To determine the value of a key field, use the <xref:System.Collections.DictionaryEntry.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: For å bestemme verdien for et nøkkelfelt, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Collections.DictionaryEntry.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName>egenskapen.</xref:System.Collections.DictionaryEntry.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A dictionary that contains field name/value pairs that represent the primary key of the row to delete.
trans-unit.target: En liste som inneholder feltet Navn/verdi-par som representerer primærnøkkelen for raden som skal slettes.

trans-unit.source: Gets the index of the row being deleted.
trans-unit.target: Henter indeksen i raden som skal slettes.

trans-unit.source: The row index is frequently used to retrieve the specified row from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Rows%2A> collection of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: Radindeksen ofte brukes til å hente den angitte raden fra den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Rows%2A>samling av <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Rows%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can then access the row's properties.
trans-unit.target: Du kan deretter tilgang til den raden egenskaper.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the row being deleted.
trans-unit.target: Den nullbaserte indeksen for raden som skal slettes.

trans-unit.source: Gets a dictionary of the non-key field name/value pairs for the row to delete.
trans-unit.target: Henter en ordliste for ikke-nøkkelfelt navn/verdi-par for raden skal slettes.

trans-unit.source: The Values property is automatically populated with the name/value pairs of the non-key fields for the row.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen verdier fylles automatisk med navn/verdi-par med feltene ikke er en nøkkel for raden.

trans-unit.source: To determine the field name of an entry, use the <xref:System.Collections.DictionaryEntry.Key%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property of a <xref:System.Collections.DictionaryEntry?displayProperty=fullName> object in the Values dictionary.
trans-unit.target: Bruk til å fastslå navnet på en oppføring i <xref:System.Collections.DictionaryEntry.Key%2A?displayProperty=fullName>for en <xref:System.Collections.DictionaryEntry?displayProperty=fullName>objektet i ordlisten verdier.</xref:System.Collections.DictionaryEntry?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Collections.DictionaryEntry.Key%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: To determine the value of an entry, use the <xref:System.Collections.DictionaryEntry.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: For å bestemme verdien for en oppføring, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Collections.DictionaryEntry.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName>egenskapen.</xref:System.Collections.DictionaryEntry.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The primary key field or fields are not included in this dictionary.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Felt eller felt er ikke inkludert i ordlisten.

trans-unit.source: To access the values of the primary key field or fields, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewDeleteEventArgs.Keys%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha tilgang til verdiene i den primære nøkkelfeltet eller felt, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewDeleteEventArgs.Keys%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewDeleteEventArgs.Keys%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary"></xref> object that contains the non-key field name/value pairs of the row to delete.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary"> </xref> objekt som inneholder ikke-nøkkelfelt navn/verdi-par med raden som skal slettes.
